xml.Summary: "pages when switching to the Ukrainian language is not localized"
xml.Precondition: "Open www.medecine.com" , "the user is registered and authorized"
xml.Steps: "In the upper right corner switch the language from Rus to Ukr"
xml.Actualresult: "All information on the site is not displayed in Ukrainian"
xml.Expected: "All information on the site is displayed in Ukrainia"
